statements: DELETE FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE task_type = 'classification' AND id = 1;
DELETE FROM text_data_for_nlp WHERE id = 5 AND task_type = 'annotation';
DELETE FROM processed_text WHERE original_text_id IN (SELECT id FROM text_data ORDER BY created_at DESC)
DELETE FROM document_table WHERE is_processed = false AND author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM sentence_table WHERE document_id = 1 AND content LIKE '%bad%'
DELETE FROM word_table WHERE document_id = 2 AND word = 'important'
